Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Teleporter Core^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I am in dire need of your assistance. I need a ^orange;Teleporter Core^reset; to finish my teleporter, but ^green;the courier delivering my supplies is late^reset; and I'm running out of time. You can craft one in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;.

Without ^orange;Teleporter Cores^reset;, you won't be able to craft several useful technologies. Plus, teleporters are just plain fun!!! Oh, there's the courier with ^green;your replacement core^reset;.
